page.title: 27Light Industry
page.content:
Framework knitting was an important industry in Hucknall long before the coal mines. However, most of the larger textile companies have now gone: Vedonis, Jaeger and Viyella among them. Established in the 1850s, F J Bamkin Ltd still make the famous Bamkin Sock, supplying outdoor and industrial wear wholesalers. Hucknall is home to the largest independent manufacturer of insecticides, fertilisers etc. in the UK: Doff Portland. They are one of Europeâ€™s largest producers of slug killer pellets.
